description: Creates a new opt-out list. If the opt-out list name already exists, an error is returned. An opt-out list is a list of phone numbers that are opted out, meaning you can't send SMS or voice messages to them. If end user replies with the keyword 'STOP,' an entry for the phone number is added to the opt-out list. In addition to STOP, your recipients can use any supported opt-out keyword, such as CANCEL or OPTOUT. For a list of supported opt-out keywords, see SMS opt out in the AWS End User Messaging SMS User Guide.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The name of the new OptOutList.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) to associate with the new OptOutList. (dict) --- The list of tags to be added to the specified topic. The key identifier, or name, of the tag. The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If you don't specify a client token, a randomly generated token is used for the request to ensure idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: OptOutListArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the OptOutList.

nested_items.name: OptOutListName
nested_items.description: The name of the new OptOutList.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: An array of tags (key and value pairs) associated with the new OptOutList.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key identifier, or name, of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The string value associated with the key of the tag.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the pool was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
